item.title: A Bobcat Crashes the Worksite!
item.description: An unexpected guest shows up in the middle of the job — see what happens when a curious Bobcat decides to join the action..

media:content.media:title: A Bobcat Crashes the Worksite!
media:content.media:description: An unexpected guest shows up in the middle of the job — see what happens when a curious Bobcat decides to join the action..

item.title: Removing a Jackknifed Trailer from a Busy Road!
item.description: A challenging recovery unfolds as the crew works fast to safely clear a jackknifed trailer and reopen the road.

item.title: 5 Years Submerged:: The First Steps Toward Recovery
item.description: After years underwater, the recovery begins. Watch as the team carefully brings this long-lost machine back to life.

item.title: Log Truck Rolls on Busy Road - Driver is OK
item.description: A log truck overturns on a crowded roadway, but thanks to safety measures and swift response, the driver escapes unharmed.

item.title: Miracle on the Wrong Side
item.description: A close call becomes a moment of gratitude as quick thinking turns potential disaster into a roadside miracle.

item.title: A Tow Wife's Unexpected Date Night
item.description: When work and life collide, a tow call turns into a surprise date night — humor and heart from life on the road.

item.title: The Great Jeep Escape
item.description: A wild day on the trail turns into an unforgettable Jeep escape — teamwork, recovery, and plenty of mud along the way.

item.title: A Large Tractor Is Stuck in a Significant Ditch!
item.description: A massive tractor ends up trapped in a deep ditch — watch the careful recovery process as the crew works to bring it safely back on solid ground.

item.title: That Was A Close Call!
item.description: A tense moment on the job nearly ends in disaster — quick thinking and steady teamwork make all the difference.

item.title: This Is for Code 3!
item.description: Responding to an urgent Code 3 call, the team races to the scene for a high-priority recovery that demands speed and precision.

item.title: High-Stakes Recovery After Head-On Crash
item.description: A pickup and semi collide head-on, creating a dangerous recovery scene where every move counts to ensure safety and success.

item.title: Car vs. Pole and a Stolen Excavator
item.description: A chaotic situation unfolds involving a wrecked car and a stolen excavator — see how crews handle this unpredictable recovery.

item.title: On The Road for a Code 3 Call!
item.description: Responding fast to a high-priority Code 3 call, the team rushes to assist in a time-sensitive roadside recovery operation.

item.title: Can We Save This Truck From Falling?
item.description: A truck teeters on the edge — watch the precise recovery work that could prevent a total loss and restore it to safety.

item.title: It Is What It Is. Our Equipment Breaks Too! Lifting a Lift
item.description: Even the toughest equipment can fail — watch as a broken lift gets rescued and repaired with the same precision it once delivered.

item.title: The Eaton Cummins Endurant XD Pro
item.description: Explore the Eaton Cummins Endurant XD Pro — a transmission built for power, reliability, and performance in demanding heavy-duty conditions.

item.title: Night Rescue: Saving a Stuck Car
item.description: Under the cover of night, a delicate recovery operation unfolds as a stranded car is pulled to safety with skill and precision.

item.title: Gasoline Tanker Stuck on Road Edge
item.description: A fully loaded fuel tanker leans dangerously off the road — crews work carefully to recover it safely without spills or damage.

item.title: Rotator Recovery on a Precarious Gravel Road!
item.description: A recovery team tackles a challenging job on a steep gravel road, using precision and control to stabilize and tow a stranded vehicle.

item.title: Messy Trash Truck Wreck!
item.description: Crews work to safely clear and recover a messy trash truck accident, showing the teamwork and precision behind complex road cleanups.
